mapper.sql: id, check_code, warehouse_id, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, check_status, check_type, inventory_count, check_count, check_by, check_start_time, check_finish_time, update_start_time, update_finish_time, remark, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select: select a.id, a.check_code as "checkCode", a.check_status as "checkStatus", a.check_type as "checkType", a.create_time as "createTime", IFNULL(b.totalNum, 0) as "totalNum", IFNULL(c.completedNum, 0) as "completedNum" from wms_inventory_check a left join(select inventory_check_id,count(*) totalNum from wms_inventory_check_detail where is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY inventory_check_id) b on a.id = b.inventory_check_id left join(select inventory_check_id,count(*) completedNum from wms_inventory_check_detail where is_deleted = 0 and check_status=3 GROUP BY inventory_check_id) c on a.id = c.inventory_check_id where 1=1 and a.is_deleted = 0 AND a.check_code = #{checkCode} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.id
